metadata.title: CVE-2020-21066 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 v1.5.1.0. There is a heap-buffer-overflowin AP4_Dec3Atom::AP4_Dec3Atom at Ap4Dec3Atom.cpp, leading to a denial ofservice (program crash), as demonstrated by mp42aac.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
